HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku auto-injects this app's hostname into the env when using review apps. We use it to determine if we're in a review app. https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/github-integration-review-apps#injected-environment-variables

LANG.description: Document language and encoding supplied with HTTP responses

RACK_ENV.description: Rack environment; defaults to same as RAILS_ENV

RAILS_LOG_TO_STDOUT.description: Configures Rails to log to stdout, which we pick up with log monitoring add-ons

RAILS_SERVE_STATIC_FILES.description: Configures Rails to generate and serve static files directly without using an external asset server

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: Secret salt used for generating random things such as UUIDs; required, but generated and rotated by hand to control session kills

MALLOC_ARENA_MAX.description: Recommended to be set to '2' to manage Sidekiq's memory usage.
